ygData.subject: Re: Wizard Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: Neriak is extremely safe and quick to travel to from freeport, just zone from ecommons into the nektulos forrest and head along path to neriak.  It will take
ygData.messageBody:
Neriak is extremely safe and quick to travel to from freeport, just zone
from ecommons into the nektulos forrest and head along path to neriak. It
will take about 5 minutes. Only problem is as soon as any npc sees you, you
willed be killed on sight, and very quickly too. So Neriak probably
shouldn't be your first choice.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard

-----Original Message-----
From: Billy Sun <bsun@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, April 22, 1999 4:45 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Wizard Spell


>From: "Billy Sun" <bsun@...>

>Neriak sounds pretty close. How safe it is to travel from Freeport to
